### Berom
1.  A yin bemasi mwa ji jey,<br>
    Na yin bemat lagwi.<br>
    Wot rɔ̂ nɔ̂ng wa nerey aret?<br>
    Yesu zong, Yesu, Yesu, Yesu Darwey mot.

2.  Mwa yin vê nuha Darwey mot,<br>
    Ye ngyek e de fwom me.<br>
    Wot rɔ̂ nɔ̂ng wa nerey aret.<br>
    Yesu zong, Yesu, Yesu, Yesu Darwey mot.

3.  Yin mwa de yin e somo hɛ,<br>
    Na yin vê râ ye won.<br>
    Wot rɔ̂ nɔ̂ng wa nerey aret?<br>
    Yesu zong, Yesu, Yesu, Yesu Darwey mot.

4.  Hwo Bitrus, hwo Istifanus,<br>
    Bulus na bwang begwa.<br>
    Wot rɔ̂ nɔ̂ng wa nerey aret?<br>
    Yesu zong, Yesu, Yesu, Yesu Darwey mot.

5.  Yerê bemasî mwa ji jey,<br>
    Somo hin Darwey mot.<br>
    Wot rɔ̂ nɔ̂ng wa nerey aret?<br>
    Yesu zong, Yesu, Yesu, Yesu Darwey mot.



### English
1.  All hail the power of Jesus' name!<br>
    Let angels prostrate fall;<br>
    Bring forth the royal diadem,<br>
    And crown Him Lord of all!

2.  Crown Him, ye martyrs of our God,<br>
    Who from His altar call;<br>
    Extol the stem of Jesse's rod,<br>
    And crown Him Lord of all!

3.  Ye chosen seed of Israel's race,<br>
    A remnant weak and small,<br>
    Hail Him who saves you by His grace,<br>
    And crown Him Lord of all!

4.  Ye Gentile sinners, ne'er forget,<br>
    The wormwood and the gall;<br>
    Go, spread your trophies at His feet,<br>
    And crown Him Lord of all!

5.  Let every kindred, every tribe,<br>
    On this terrestrial ball,<br>
    To Him all Majesty ascribe,<br>
    And crown Him Lord of all!

6.  Oh that with yonder sacred throng,<br>
    We at His feet may fall;<br>
    Join in the everlasting song,<br>
    And crown Him Lord of all!
